A Weird Thing Happened at the Studio
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Studio (Combining/Breeding): A Weird Thing Happened at the Studio
By Orange Dragon on Monday, September 1, 2003 - 12:53 pm:

Ok, I just got diva and combined gali+monol to get ragnaroks i haven't unlocked him yet but i did get him!. Then I froze him and after aroma come talks about ragnaroks. I can't revive the ragnaroks I froze earlier!, Chamois said I couldn't handle it yet. Is this a bug or something!?

By GoldenBoy on Monday, September 1, 2003 - 06:39 pm:

This is a loophole with legendary dragons. When it comes
to legends you unlock one kind and it opens all of them,
including the breeding combination. Some breeds have a
special legend, but that only gets unlocked after the
original (Tiger) When it comes to dragons, there are two to
unlock, but only one lets you have access to all others.
Most people get Diva first, and can perform the combo to
get Rags, but Rags is the dragon that opens all other
legends, not Diva. If you get Diva first, you can make a
Rags, but Legend dragons passes shouldn't work, and if
you freeze a combined Rags then Chamois will keep him
locked until you get the event. Whether or not you call it a
bug is up to you, I don't.

By GoldenBoy on Monday, September 1, 2003 - 06:42 pm:

PS its a dragon and a monol to make rags, not a gali.
